price: Ё улардан ҳар бир кимса ноз-неъмат жаннатига киритилишни тама қилурми?!
arabic: أَيَطۡمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُدۡخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٖ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ayaṭmaʿu kullu im'ri-in min'hum an yud'khala jannata naʿīmin
